entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to minus 32 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 32 by morning. Wind chill minus 49 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 25.
